name: Capitol AI
headline: Capitol is a custom perplexity for every website in the world.
description:
As Perplexity or Gemini replaces the Google Search we all use today, it will remove the need to ever visit a website. This is an existential risk to all media brands, which is why Capitol went from zero to $1.68M in revenue during YC: all media companies need to offer THEIR OWN Perplexity-like experience to maintain their direct relationship with customers. The most trusted brand in political news and analysis, Politico, chose us to power their Politico Pro Subscription product.

Consumers expect instant personalized answers. Publishers won‚Äôt build this on their own.

Capitol‚Äôs API lights up publishers' websites and apps so their end users can generate personalized search results, cited research reports, and even tweet storms using the publisher‚Äôs proprietary data‚Äîall within their paywall. 

Capitol is the new last mile of content delivery for publishing. This market is $16b in 2023, and will grow to $85.6b in 2030.

Gemini and Perplexity are the imperial forces. Capitol is arming the rebels.

founders.name: Shaun Modi, Founder & CEO
founders.description: Shaun Modi is the founder and CEO of Capitol AI, an infinitely smart research assistant that instantly generates high-quality content from your documents. One of the founding designers of Airbnb, Shaun has been named one of Business Insider‚Äôs Top 75 Designers in Technology. Shaun has designed software products for technology giants, the government, and its agencies, including Google, the White House, DoD, NASA, CDC, and Motorola. At Airbnb, Shaun worked side by side with CEO Brian Chesky.

founders.name: thomas hallaran, Founder
founders.description: Software engineer and technical manager with a product mindset. Two decades of experience, including IC and Director positions in academia, venture backed startups, and the US Federal Government.

generated_description:
**Capitol AI: Revolutionizing Content Delivery**

Founded in 2021 and based in Washington, DC, Capitol AI is on a mission to create a ‚Äúcustom perplexity‚Äù solution for every website in the world. Initially launching as As Perplexity or Gemini‚Äîinnovative tools aiming to replace traditional Google searches‚ÄîCapitol AI is addressing a looming existential threat faced by media brands. By offering a sophisticated API, Capitol empowers publishers to deliver personalized search results, research reports, and even social media content all within their paywalls, thereby enhancing their relationship with users.

Capitol AI experienced rapid growth, generating $1.68 million in revenue during its time at Y Combinator. It became a vital partner for Politico, helping power their Politico Pro Subscription product, and positioned itself directly in the fight against generic search engines that strip publishers of direct customer engagement. 

The demand for instant, personalized answers has never been higher, and Capitol aims to bridge the gap where publishers can't‚Äîor won't‚Äîdevelop these capabilities on their own. With an expansive market currently valued at $16 billion, projected to grow to $85.6 billion by 2030, Capitol AI is poised to become the critical last mile of content delivery for publishers. 

With a lean team of 11 and under the guidance of Y Combinator Group Partner Garry Tan, Capitol AI is tagged in fields like artificial intelligence, workflow automation, analytics, and media. They are armed and ready; while Gemini and Perplexity may dominate the landscape, Capitol is empowering the rebellion of content creators.

For more about Capitol AI and their offerings, you can visit their website at [capitol.ai](https://www.capitol.ai/).
